name: Arcade Back
description:
You are playing a snake game or may be you are not playing the snake... This LowRez2022 Game Jam submission will amaze you through a confusing story about a group of criminals... don't know why... but trying to steal a special rare edition Arcade Machine... You need to get it back... Play and find out...

ARROW KEYS to MOVE the snake character

LEFT MOUSE CLICK to do an ATTACK

(The game is in development. This just a glimpse of the game made in about 2 days)
